          <title>
            <string language="fr">Pollution de l'eau</string>
            <string language="en">Water pollution</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wasserverunreinigung</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Poluição da água</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Inquinamento dell'acqua</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ρύπανση των υδάτων</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Contaminación del agua</string>
          </title>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <description>
            <string language="fr">Cette illustration montre comment les déchets d'usine  polluent la mer qui empoisonnent des poissons et toute autre vie marine.</string>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows how factory waste pollute the sea that poison fish and other marine life.</string>
          </description>

            <string language="fr">usine</string>
            <string language="en">factory</string>
          </keyword>

            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt, wie Fabrikvergeudung das 
Meer beschmutzen, das Fische und andere Marinelebensdauer vergiften.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra como o desperdício da 
fábrica pollute o mar que envenena peixes e a outra vida marinha.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra come lo spreco della 
fabbrica inquina il mare che avvelena i pesci e l'altra vita marina.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση επιδεικνύει πώς τα απόβλητα 
εργοστασίων μολύνουν τη θάλασσα που ψάρια δηλητήριων και άλλη 
θαλάσσια ζωή.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra cómo la basura de la 
fábrica contamina el mar que envenena los pescados y la otra vida 
marina.</string>
          </description>
